section.title: Linearization of Process
section.simpara: Due to the limitations of a single developer for most of the process, the Cleanroom cycle must be linearized, as only a single process will be active at any given time. This is the following linearization, indicating the progression of processes:

itemizedlist.title: Auxiliary Processes
itemizedlist.simpara: These are processes that are not normally part of the cycle, but are entered on demand when necessary. They usually lead to an entry into another process in the course of fulfilling the requirements of the auxiliary process.
